meanings.definition: The quality or state of being highhanded.
meanings.sent1: Her highhandednesses in the meeting made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: His highhandednesses in decision-making often led to conflicts.
meanings.sent3: The cat's highhandednesses in demanding treats was both amusing and annoying.
meanings.sent4: The highhandednesses of the storm left a trail of destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's highhandednesses in grading were unfair and frustrating for the students.

meanings.definition: The act or practice of being highhanded.
meanings.sent1: The highhandednesses of the manager caused resentment among the employees.
meanings.sent2: Engaging in highhandednesses can damage relationships and trust.
meanings.sent3: The highhandednesses of the squirrel stealing all the nuts was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The highhandednesses of the waves crashing against the shore were awe-inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The politician's highhandednesses alienated many voters.

meanings.definition: The behavior of someone who is highhanded.
meanings.sent1: His highhandednesses towards his subordinates created a toxic work environment.
meanings.sent2: She displayed highhandednesses by always insisting on having her way.
meanings.sent3: The highhandednesses of the toddler demanding all the toys was both cute and frustrating.
meanings.sent4: The highhandednesses of the lion asserting dominance over the pride was evident.
meanings.sent5: The highhandednesses of the CEO made it difficult for employees to voice their opinions.
